Mysterious Dye Merchant Roepina:
Hey you, adventurer! Yes, you!
Perhaps you're looking for good quality dyes that can be used for symbols? Hmm? Well, you've come to... or walked by... the right place! Remember that if you DO happen to purchase one, its content will be randomly assigned.
You could find yourself with a plain dye, or rare dye...
What do you think? Don't you want to try?
